title: 7.9 Lag and game freezes
body: Ever since this patch update I'm getting mid game frame freezes.  My ping and internet connection are fine.  Please help.  Anyone have a fix?

replies.body: It sounds like this might be happening from some kind of weird graphics/driver interaction. Let's try going through and making sure all of your drivers are up to date, as well a few other possible fixes in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Hit me back up if you don't see any improvements, and make sure to test it in a custom or practice game!
